name: DFX Social Executor Node
description: A DFX social node with Telegram Bot API integration for message sending and bot management. Provides components for sending text messages with formatting options, chat management, and bot information retrieval.
author: Droq Team

DFXTelegramComponent.description: Send messages to Telegram chats via Bot API with comprehensive configuration options including text formatting (Markdown/HTML), web preview control, and silent notifications.
DFXTelegramComponent.author: Droq Team
